XRP ยังอยู่ในตลาดเพชรฟองต่อบิทคอยน์ และแผนภูมิ XRP/BTC มีศักยภาพเพิ่มขึ้น 51%

XRP Still in Bull Market Versus Bitcoin, and XRP/BTC Chart Puts 51% Upside on the Menu

35m ago//Gamza Khanzadaev
bitcoinaltcoinsregulation
AI

Summary

TH

แม้ตลาดคริปโตจะผ่านช่วงความผันผวนอย่างรุนแรงและ XRP ลดลง 26% ในคู่สกุลเงิน USD แตะตลาด แตะ XRP ยังคงรักษาตำแหน่งเชิงบวกต่อ Bitcoin ไว้ได้ XRP/BTC กำลังซื้อขายอยู่เหนือแนวรับสำคัญของแกนกลาง Bollinger Band รายเดือนซึ่งเป็นเส้นแบ่งเชิงเทคนิคที่แบ่งแยกตลาดหุ้นนกกระจอกกับตลาดหุ้นนกแอร์ระยะยาว ถ้าแนวโน้มนี้คงอยู่ นักวิเคราะห์คาดการณ์ว่า XRP มีศักยภาพที่จะพุ่งสูงขึ้นถึง 51% ในคู่ XRP/BTC โดยมีเป้าหมายที่ราคา 0.00003293 BTC

EN

Despite market-wide volatility and a significant 26% drop in XRP's USD value, the altcoin maintains a bullish position against Bitcoin. XRP/BTC is trading above the crucial monthly mid-Bollinger Band, which has historically acted as the dividing line between bull and bear markets. Technical indicators show strong recovery on both daily and weekly timeframes, with XRP bouncing 11% in the last 24 hours and forming a bullish engulfing pattern on the daily chart. If this technical setup holds, analysts predict a potential 51% rally for XRP against Bitcoin, with a target price of 0.00003293 BTC. As long as XRP/BTC doesn't close below the midband monthly, it remains one of the few top-10 altcoin pairs still technically in a bull market.

Key Points

  • XRP shows bullish signals against Bitcoin despite market volatility
  • Trading above monthly mid-Bollinger Band indicates bull market continuation
  • Potential 51% rally to 0.00003293 BTC is possible if technical setup holds

Article

We believe that all content is accurate as of the date of publication, but certain offers mentioned may no longer be available. While most of the crypto market is dealing with the implications of yesterday's multibillion bloodbath, XRP holds its ground against Bitcoin in a way few noticed. Despite extreme volatility and a brutal 26% single-day drop in its USD pair this week, XRP/BTC as presented by TradingView is still trading above the key monthly mid-Bollinger Band — an important line that often separates long-term bull and bear cycles. You Might Also Like HOT Stories This hold signals that the altcoin remains in a bullish phase versus Bitcoin , with current price action showing strong recovery on both daily and weekly time frames. If the setup holds, a move to the 0.00003293 BTC level — a 51% rally — looks more probable than not. Last bull market hope for XRP Despite market-wide bloodletting and Bitcoin’s multi-leg collapse to as low as $60,000, XRP continues to flash an unlikely but nonetheless intact bullish setup on the BTC pair. The midband has historically acted as the make-or-break line between bull and bear markets. In February 2026, XRP is not only still closing above that level but is printing a green candle after a double rejection wick into the 0.000018 zone, a region that previously marked cycle bottoms in both 2019 and 2023. XRP/BTC by TradingView On the weekly chart, XRP has stabilized just above the lower Bollinger Band and bounced 11% in the last 24 hours — one of the sharpest reversals among major altcoins. Daily structure confirms a full-bodied engulfing candle reclaiming the entire last week’s breakdown. What's next for XRP against Bitcoin? From a technical perspective, the next logical upside target sits near 0.00003293 BTC — the upper Bollinger Band on the monthly chart. That puts a 51% move from current levels on the menu. Barring a monthly close below the midband, XRP/BTC remains one of the few top-10 altcoin pairs still technically in a bull market.
